long_description: Keep an included SpeedDraw(TM) flask close-at-hand and securely in place with the lightweight Nathan Peak Hydration Waist Pack and its angled, insulated, patented XTS cradle(TM). 18 fl. oz. Ergological(TM) SpeedDraw Flask with push-pull cap. Angled, insulated bottle holder allows easy 1-handed access and a bounce-free ride. Extended side panels hug the body comfortably for a custom fit. The Nathan Peak Hydration Waist Pack features an expandable zippered stretch pocket that keeps essentials protected and an external shockcord system for extra storage options.
short_description: Keep an included SpeedDraw(TM) flask close-at-hand and securely in place with the lightweight Nathan Peak Hydration Waist Pack and its angled, insulated, patented XTS cradle(TM).
